title: Handle a Platform-Wide Outage
description: The ride-sharing app is experiencing a major outage, and neither riders nor drivers can use the service. The support team must manage communications.

tasks.description: The system monitoring tools report a critical, platform-wide failure.
The support manager posts a notification on the company's official social media channels acknowledging the outage.
The support team activates a pre-written response template to handle the high volume of incoming support tickets about the outage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Support agents can respond to inquiries efficiently.

tasks.description: Once the service is restored, a final update is posted, and any trips affected by the outage are automatically refunded.
tasks.expected_outcome: The incident is resolved, and affected users are compensated.
